data.name: ReadDebtDetailDebt
data.value: select T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.DUE_DT, T1.BAL_DUE_AMT, T1.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DEBT_ADJ_IND, T2.DEBT_TYP, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (@otyType = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.DEBT_TYP = 'D') order by T1.DUE_DT desc

data.name: ReadMonthlyObligorSummary
data.value: select top(1) FNCL_MSUM_TYP, FNCL_MSUM_YR_MTH, MFS_GENERATED_ID, CPA_S_TYPE, CSP_S_NUMBER, OBG_S_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, FM_CURR_BAL from CKT_MNTHLY_OBR_SUM where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgSGeneratedId = OBG_S_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspSNumber = CSP_S_NUMBER) and (@cpaSType = CPA_S_TYPE) and (FNCL_MSUM_YR_MTH = @fnclMsumYrMth)

data.name: ReadObligationPaymentSchedule
data.value: select top(1) OTY_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, OBG_CSP_NUMBER, OBG_CPA_TYPE, START_DT, OBLIG_PSCH_AMT, END_DT, FRQ_PRD_CD, DAY_OF_WEEK, DAY_OF_MONTH_1, DAY_OF_MONTH_2, PERIOD_IND from CKT_OB_PYMNT_SCH where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@obgCspNumber = OBG_CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgCpaType = OBG_CPA_TYPE) and (START_DT <= @startDt) and (END_DT >= @startDt)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId
